alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 5:25PM CDT until March 31 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Vernon County in southwestern Wisconsin... * Until 545 PM CDT. * At 525 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Coon Valley, or 10 miles northwest of Viroqua, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Coon Valley around 535 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Brinkman Ridge, Esofea, Spring Ridge, and Runge Hollow. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
